channel.title: [Release]Blade Of Awe[/Release]
channel.description:
[b]DON'T BE A LEECHER, if you so much as read this, then reply.[/b]
Well, first of ill start with Credits
[B]Credits[/B] [b]Mironic[/b] - 5% For giving me the idea [b]Adventure Quest[/b] - 45% Origional creators [b]Me[/b] - 50% Creating the 3D model
I made this model after seeing Mironic's version, which i liked alot, and after gettin permission to do my own version of it, here it is.
Blender- High Poly: [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/BoAhd.jpg[/img]
Low Poly: [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/BoAld.jpg[/img]
Metasequoia- Low Poly: [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/BoAmeta.jpg[/img]
Looks the same in the datmaker as it did in meta, so itll look pretty good ingame. To Mironic - If you want me to remove the Download, just say so, its your choice.

item.title: [Release]Blade Of Awe[/Release]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:28, topic:297526”][quote author=2 Speced link=topic=393886.msg3449377#msg3449377 date=1293641420]
You just never give up do you lol. Nice job 10/10 one of the best models I’ve seen.
[/quote]
People, please cut it out. Obviously nobody is reading the above posts, so let me help you.

[size=48pt]DO NOT POST ON THIS THREAD. THIS IS AN OLD THREAD, AND IS CONSIDERED “DEAD”.[/size][/quote]
Caps lock not necessary. Just report the thread and move on.

item.title: [Release]Blade Of Awe[/Release]
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Danielplanto:

I have the Blade of Awe on Adventure Quest and TBH it Kicks Ass lol. You know, the spec for it should cost 200% of your spec (spec potions req, if you have them in your source (made by me)) and 1hit KO the monster, like the B.O.A’s Death skill, the 1% chance skill.

Please don’t gravedig xD

God Sword stance.

item.title: [Release]Blade Of Awe[/Release]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:6, topic:297526”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=393886.msg2928997#msg2928997 date=1251158720]
Nice, but when did mods start getting so down into the “rs compatable” thing? Cuase when i started here nobody followed that.
[/quote]
Idk, i hate MITB, never seem to get replies. so now i have to go through all the trouble of making the models rs capable[/quote]

eh, if you get any replies at all its either flame or REALLY bad criticism, i went there a couple days and i was disgusted by the bad taste everyone (almost) has.
they couldnt find anything nice to say to save their lives.

Read full topic
